%% Mermaid — Business Model (Canvas + Mindmap)

%% Canvas (grouped by subgraphs)
flowchart LR
  subgraph KP[Key Partners]
    KP1[Community orgs & NGOs]
    KP2[Campuses & HOAs]
    KP3[Coworking & maker spaces]
    KP4[Local businesses]
    KP5[Infra: Vercel, MongoDB, Cloudinary, SendGrid, Mapbox]
  end

  subgraph KA[Key Activities]
    KA1[Platform development]
    KA2[Trust & safety, moderation]
    KA3[Onboarding & community ops]
    KA4[Partnerships & growth]
    KA5[Support & success]
  end

  subgraph KR[Key Resources]
    KR1[Product & codebase]
    KR2[Brand & community]
    KR3[Ambassadors & moderators]
    KR4[Data & insights]
    KR5[Infra & tooling]
  end

  subgraph VP[Value Propositions]
    VP1[Cashless time-credit exchanges]
    VP2[Hyperlocal trust & reciprocity]
    VP3[Structured flow lowers friction]
    VP4[Affordable access to help]
  end

  subgraph CR[Customer Relationships]
    CR1[Reputation & reviews]
    CR2[Notifications & guidance]
    CR3[Community standards]
    CR4[Responsive support]
  end

  subgraph CH[Channels]
    CH1[Local ambassadors]
    CH2[Community partnerships]
    CH3[Campus & social groups]
    CH4[Content/SEO]
  end

  subgraph CS[Customer Segments]
    CS1[Neighbors & families]
    CS2[Students & retirees]
    CS3[Creators & freelancers]
    CS4[Community orgs & campuses]
  end

  subgraph $Cost[Cost Structure]
    C1[Hosting & infra]
    C2[Moderation & support]
    C3[Growth & partnerships]
    C4[Email/SMS & tooling]
    C5[Compliance & admin]
  end

  subgraph $Revenue[Revenue Streams]
    R1[Premium placement]
    R2[Org subscriptions (admin tools)]
    R3[Sponsored listings/partners]
    R4[Credit top-ups / donations]
  end

  %% High-level relationships
  KP --> KA
  KR --> KA
  KA --> VP
  VP --> CS
  CH --> CS
  CR --> CS
  $Cost --> KA
  $Revenue --> VP


%% Mindmap (alternate view)
mindmap
  root((Hyperlocal SkillSwap — Business Model))
    Value Propositions
      Cashless time credits
      Hyperlocal trust
      Structured request→review flow
      Affordable access
    Customer Segments
      Neighbors & families
      Students & retirees
      Creators & freelancers
      Community orgs & campuses
    Channels
      Ambassadors
      Partnerships
      Campus/social groups
      Content/SEO
    Customer Relationships
      Reviews & reputation
      Guidance & notifications
      Community standards
      Support
    Key Resources
      Product codebase
      Brand & community
      Ambassadors/moderators
      Data & insights
      Infra/tooling
    Key Activities
      Development
      Trust & safety
      Onboarding & ops
      Partnerships & growth
      Support
    Key Partners
      Community orgs
      Campuses/HOAs
      Coworking/makerspaces
      Local businesses
      Infra vendors
    Cost Structure
      Hosting/infra
      Moderation/support
      Growth/partnerships
      Email/tooling
      Compliance/admin
    Revenue Streams
      Premium placement
      Org subscriptions
      Sponsored listings
      Credit top-ups/donations
